official_title: To provide equity in the Pacific Northwest in the event of the loss of a regional electric generating resource through a state initiative.

summary.text: Amends the Pacific Northwest Electric Power and Conservation Act to provide that if a Federal electric generating base resource is closed in the Northwest region due to passage of a State voting initiative, the resulting outages, transmission problems, and costs shall not be passed on to the consumers of other States in the region.

titles.title: To provide equity in the Pacific Northwest in the event of the loss of a regional electric generating resource through a state initiative.
